com.server.command

Class RecoverCreaturesCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.server.command.ComparableCommand
      • com.server.command.RecoverCreaturesCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ComparableCommand>

    public class RecoverCreaturesCommand
extends ComparableCommand
    Calls the recovery method of every living Creature in the game.
    Author:
    Stephen Patel
    See Also:
